entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
